rounds.meaning: Freezing converts liquids to solids. A common example of this is freezing water into ice.
Heat is responsible for many different phase changes.
Melting converts solids into liquids. An ice cream can melt into a liquid if left outside the fridge for too long.
Steam is the vapor produced by boiling liquids. They form a white smoke of water droplets in the air.
A thermometer is a special device used to measure how hot or cold something is.
